All,
I put up a photo of the parrying bars and a drawing of the koshirae of the nerikawa-guard nagamaki we were discussing at:

http://tinyurl.com/dvc8

Note that the parrying bars have slight notches or barbs on them, perhaps to catch or even break an opponent's blade.

Jim
